column4: Hi, can anyone point me in the right direction to finding out the manufacturer of my motherboard? I want to update my BIOS but I need to know the manufacturer first.
You'd prolly have to pop the case open and look for some identifying marks on the board.  What type of pc is it custom built?
ahh well if you just search on HPs site they will have a bios upgrade by model.  Are you sure you need one though?
